title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python library.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama for chat, LLM, embeddings and tool-calling.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user, dark/light themes).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with sync/async APIs, streaming, and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, list, delete models natively in Ruby.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper for Ollama with conversation history, syntax highlighting and themes.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot’s UI and keybindings.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and PVC support.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake and package definition for Ollama; reproducible installs on NixOS and macOS.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration for Ollama: chat, generation and embedding components.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official C# / .NET client library for Ollama with async streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda 8 connector that exposes Ollama models as BPMN service tasks for low-latency inference.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for private AI assistance using Ollama: summarize notes, rewrite, Q&A.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Experimental Terraform provider to pull and manage Ollama models as infrastructure resources.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Lightweight Slack bot that answers channel mentions using any Ollama model.
